'''Arkhium Lumenite''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after forging the {{Item|Arkhium Stock}} at [[Bravais' Press Works]].

It can be used to power the door mechanism to unlock [[Bravais' Hidden Study]] as part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Arkhium Forge]]'', earning the {{Achievement|Not So Strait Is the Gate}}.
